t: Mattel | Thomas the Tank Engine Wiki | Fandom
s: Mattel, Inc. is an American multinational toy manufacturing company founded by Harold Matson, Ruth Handler, and Elliot Handler in 1945. They are most famous for their toy products such as Barbie, Monster High, Polly Pocket, Matchbox, Disney-Pixar Cars and Hot Wheels.
